title: Is honor 0 permanent?
body: I've been honor 0 for 6 months or something, like 3 weeks after new honor came out. Just curious cause I did not receive a reset with season 8. Thank You.

replies.body:
Takes about 30-45 days of 10+ games per day and not being dishonorable in any way to get out of Honor Zero.

Getting valid reports slows your progress.

> [{quoted}](name=exxpose,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ej115cv0,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-01-22T17:30:32.210+0000)
>
> Takes about 30-45 days of 10+ games per day and not being dishonorable in any way to get out of Honor Zero.
> 
> Getting valid reports slows your progress.

"valid reports" haha, yeah. When you magically get qued for one of those games out of those 30 days where you play 10 a day, just ONE game you get matchmade with a 4 man pre, and die a couple times. instant reset. very valid. much wow. i love having no rewards. thanks riot.
Riot said honor 1 and lower will not receive resets.
Does that mean I will never see above honor 0 again?
You will as long as you're actually not toxic for a few months. Yes months, not weeks.
Its complete garbage that you have to spend months with 0 rewards. Might as well switch to a different game that actually treats its reformed players better.
The player shouldn't have broke the rules to begin with.

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ej115cv0,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-01-22T08:01:32.455+0000)
>
> You will as long as you're actually not toxic for a few months. Yes months, not weeks.

bruhh... 270 games since I unlocked my honor... I'm quiet (except when I give info, obv.), I get maybe 1 honor per game, never inted and I'm still honor 0. Just because I thought it would be funny to write "kys lol" to a friend in a ARAM match. I'm. So. Stupid.
Doesn't reset with season, also, how often are you playing/getting honored?
When I carry, I get 0 honor. So, I net 0 honor every game. Thanks rito
Honors aren't for carrying, it's for things like being sportsmanlike, tiltproof, making great shot calls.

providing if you can prove to the system that you are worthy to be honorable, you can get out in 2 months time. 

When I mean honorable, the first step is being **NOT** dishonorable. Meaning if you get validly reported (typically by blame your teammates / or claiming the game is over so you want to AFK), it will totally slow down your  honor progress.

Then again, time really isn't part of the formula. Someone can play only 50 games in a month vs someone that plays 300 games a month.
